EmailTemplate.name: Quote B2B Integration Approval Initiated Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Quote {!CameleonCPQ__QxQuote__c.Quote_Number__c} has been submitted for B2B integration Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello B2B Integration,
This is a notification that your internal approval is needed on {!CameleonCPQ__QxQuote__c.Name} - {!CameleonCPQ__QxQuote__c.Quote_Number__c}. Please click on the link below to access the Quote.
Link to: Quote
